content: tie off see image 1 for final mop bottom image 1 3 top straps see this section of the video tutorial here chain 13 using 5mm crochet hook row 1 starting in the 2nd chain from your hook single_crochet across the row chain 1 and turn 12 row 2-16 single_crochet in blo chain 1 and turn 12 ● once you have completed row 16 swap your 5mm crochet hook for a 4mm crochet hook if you do not have a 4mm crochet hook a 5mm hook will work fine as well work single_crochet into ¾ of the panel by 1st working into row 16 then along the long ribbed side of the panel and lastly into the original foundation chain see image 2 below this will leave one long ribbed side without scs image 2 ● slip_stitch and leave a long tail to sew strap to mop bottom ● repeat top strap section to create your second strap finishing 4 ● take the two top straps and place them on top of the mop bottom make sure the bobbles are facing away from the straps the ribbed side of the straps that you did not single_crochet around should be facing inward see image 3 image 3 ● attach straps to the mop bottom as seen in image 4 you can find how i sew my straps onto the mop in my youtube tutorial 5 image 4 weave in ends this pattern is for personal use only and should not be copied resold or redistributed the finished item may be sold with clear attributions for the pattern given to calicoradio knits 6
